Class GaiaInputController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class GaiaInputController
extends com.badlogic.gdx.input.GestureDetector
    Adaptation of libgdx's CameraInputController.
    Author:
    Toni Sagrista
